snippet: Ethnic Kachin rebels battling Myanmar’s army said they shot down a government helicopter, but the army denied the claim, saying on Saturday that engine failure caused the crash.
abstract: Ethnic Kachin rebels battling Myanmar's army in country's north say they shot down government helicopter, but army denies claim, saying engine failure caused helicopter's crash.
lead_paragraph: Ethnic Kachin rebels battling Myanmar’s army said they shot down a government helicopter, but the army denied the claim, saying on Saturday that engine failure caused the crash.

headline.seo: Rebels in Myanmar Claim They Shot Down Government Helicopter
headline.main: Rebels Claim Copter Attack in Myanmar
headline.print_headline: Rebels Claim Copter Attack In Myanmar
